HostDoc Hosting was formed to provide excellence in performance hosting and transparancy of services offered.
Our first birthday is quickly approaching and we'd like to celebrate by offering our birthday exclusive deals.
As a host still relatively new, we have lived up to our motto of providing first class service to our current clientelle and intend to continue on said path while continually improving the services offered as well as deployable locations all while focusing and striving to deliver exceptional support and assistance. 
HostDoc was formed out of a neccessity to provide low end machines at sustainable prices with performance and stability to rival if not surpass more expensive competitors machines.
Our structure is geared towards sustainability and usability. Therefore, you can be sure we never overload our nodes, ensuring you always get the expected performance from our machines.
We currently offer [shared](https://hostdoc.co.uk/shared-hosting) and [reseller](https://hostdoc.co.uk/reseller-hosting) hosting in 2 European locations (Germany and UK) as well as [KVM VPS](https://hostdoc.co.uk/kvm-vps) in 7 locations with a US location pending plus [resource pools](https://hostdoc.co.uk/cloud), [VDS](https://hostdoc.co.uk/vds) and custom [BYO](https://hostdoc.co.uk/build-your-own) (build your own) packages.
All of our locations offer DDoS mitigation and include daily backups, the ability to upload custom ISO, RAID1 or RAID10 Storage, up to 1gbps uplink, free migration to different locations (plan dependant), Virtualizor control panel and 24/7/365 Support.
We accept Paypal, Stripe and Credit/Debit cards.
All VPS plans include a 7 Day Money Back guarantee.

Extra configurable options include bandwidth, backup plans, and the option to have your machine fully managed with cpanel included.
